      java.util.ArrayList<Item> loadItems(java.io.File file)
      Loads the items from a text file.
      java.util.ArrayList<Rocket> loadU1Rockets(java.util.ArrayList<Item> itemsForLoading)
      Creates U1 rockets by trying to fill up 1 rocket with as many items as possible before creating a new rocket object and filling that one until all items are loaded.
      java.util.ArrayList<Rocket> loadU2Rockets(java.util.ArrayList<Item> itemsForLoading)
      Creates U2 rockets by trying to fill up 1 rocket with as many items as possible before creating a new rocket object and filling that one until all items are loaded.
      int runSimulation(java.util.ArrayList<Rocket> rocketsForSimulation)
      Simulates launching and landing the rockets; every time a rocket explodes or crashes it must be sent again.

    • Method Detail

      • loadItems

        public java.util.ArrayList<Item> loadItems(java.io.File file)
                                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                           java.lang.NumberFormatException
        Loads the items from a text file. Each line contains the item name, followed by a '=', and its weight in Kgs.
        Parameters:
        file - the text file provided by the user
        Returns:
        items the ArrayList of Item objects
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the File is misspelled, not found, or invalid
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if the File contains lines that aren't of the format 'String=Integer'

      • loadU1Rockets

        public java.util.ArrayList<Rocket> loadU1Rockets(java.util.ArrayList<Item> itemsForLoading)
        Creates U1 rockets by trying to fill up 1 rocket with as many items as possible before creating a new rocket object and filling that one until all items are loaded.
        Parameters:
        itemsForLoading - the ArrayList of items returned from the loadItems method
        Returns:
        filledU1Rockets the ArrayList of U1 rocket objects that are fully loaded

      • loadU2Rockets

        public java.util.ArrayList<Rocket> loadU2Rockets(java.util.ArrayList<Item> itemsForLoading)
        Creates U2 rockets by trying to fill up 1 rocket with as many items as possible before creating a new rocket object and filling that one until all items are loaded.
        Parameters:
        itemsForLoading - the ArrayList of items returned from the loadItems method
        Returns:
        filledU1Rockets the ArrayList of U2 rocket objects that are fully loaded

      • runSimulation

        public int runSimulation(java.util.ArrayList<Rocket> rocketsForSimulation)
        Simulates launching and landing the rockets; every time a rocket explodes or crashes it must be sent again.
        Parameters:
        rocketsForSimulation - the ArrayList of Rocket objects returned from loadU1Rockets or loadU2Rockets
        Returns:
        totalBudget the total budget required to send each rocket safely to Mars
